content: {"version":2,"machineId":"2b811a78-594f-46f0-b0d4-4047f48a7b4d","content":"{\"linux\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults\\n[\\n    // Toggle between terminal and editor focus\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+;\\\", \\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.focus\\\"\\n    },\\n    { \\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+;\\\", \\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.focusActiveEditorGroup\\\", \\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+l\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"expandLineSelection\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"textInputFocus\\\"\\n    }\\n]\",\"mac\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults\\n[\\n{ \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+;\\\",\\n\\t\\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.focus\\\"},\\n{ \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+;\\\",\\n\\t\\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.focusActiveEditorGroup\\\",\\n\\t\\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"}\\n]\"}"}
